attributes.action: increase the short term financial help for self employed people when sick and incapacitated
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sometimes people who are self employed may suffer ill health,have to undergo surgery and may have to take 4 to 12 weeks aproximately off work.These people get very little financial help during this time,which is very unfair as they wish to get back to work,but still have to eat,heat themeslves etc at this time,and we our a growing group that does not get enough thought or consideration from gvernment,this is wrong.
